images.mining.clustering

Class IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • learning.unsupervised.ClusteringAlg
        • images.mining.clustering.IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale
extends ClusteringAlg
    This class implements an adapted K-means approach for performing intra-image SIFT feature clustering, as described in the paper "Two pass k-means algorithm for finding SIFT clusters in an image" in 2010 at the Slovenian KDD conference which is a part of the larger Information Society multi-conference. This is one of the K-means implementations that was used in the experiments. This code should be merged with IntraImageKMeansAdapted, but these experiments were a one-off, so it was not worth the effort afterwards to re-factor things completely.

        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        bi - BufferedImage that is being clustered into SIFT feature groups.

      • IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale

        public IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi,
                            LFeatRepresentation rep,
                            int numClusters,
                            float alpha,
                            float beta)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        bi - BufferedImage that is being clustered into SIFT feature groups.
        rep - SIFTRepresentation that is a set of all the SIFT features from the image.
        numClusters - Number of clusters to cluster to.
        alpha - Float value that is the weight of the descriptors in the distance.
        beta - Float value that is the weight of the color in the distance.

        public IntraImageKMeansAdaptedScale(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi,
                            LFeatRepresentation rep,
                            int minClusters,
                            int maxClusters,
                            int repetitions,
                            boolean randomInit,
                            float alpha,
                            float beta)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        bi - BufferedImage that is being clustered into SIFT feature groups.
        rep - SIFTRepresentation that is a set of all the SIFT features from the image.
        minClusters - Integer that is the minimum number of clusters to try.
        maxClusters - Integer that is the maximum number of clusters to try.
        repetitions - Integer that is the number of repetitions.
        randomInit - Boolean indicating whether to use random initialization.
        alpha - Float value that is the weight of the descriptors in the distance.
        beta - Float value that is the weight of the color in the distance.
